content: materials 2 5 mm of 2 75mm crochet hook i used 2 5 mm cat aurora cotton yarn i used catania from schachenmayr in cream 130 light blue 173 light yellow 403 designed by rnata blue 261 yellow 280 black and pink embroidery thread safety eyes 8 00 mm stuffing yarn needle stitch marker i used thin black thread the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology instructions are easy to follow if you are familiar with basic crochet techniques the size of the toys is approximately 15 cm in sitting position it may vary though depending on the kind of yarn and hook size used you can also use any color of yarn feel free to add accessories to your very own little cats abbreviations copyright chain chain single_crochet single_crochet this is a pattern designed and written by rnata st/sts - stitch/stitches it s for personal use only you may not sell half_double_crochet half_double_crochet share printed or online reproduce distribute double_crochet double_crochet and altered any part of it do not claim it as your increase increase own however you are welcome to sell the decrease decrease finished item in a limited number provided that flo use only front loops you credit me rnata as the designer especially blo use only black loop when listing online thank you fo fasten_off 1 2 3 aurora head use cream 130 yarn round 1 start 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 invisible fasten_off round 2 increase x6 12 how to invisible fasten_off round 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 using a needle insert it in both loops of the round 4 2 single_crochet increase x6 24 second stitch after the last stitch fig 4 round 5 increase 3 single_crochet x6 30 then insert it only in the back loop of the round 6 2 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet x5 increase 2 single_crochet 36 last stitch fig 5 secure the yarn and use round 7-8 single_crochet around 36 2 rounds the remaining yarn tail for sewing round 9 4 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet x5 increase single_crochet 42 round 10-11 single_crochet around 42 2 rounds 4 round 12 6 single_crochet increase x6 48 round 13-20 single_crochet around 48 8 rounds attach the safety eyes between rounds 15 and 16 with 11 st between fig 1 skip 16 stitches from the beginning attach the first eye then skip 11 stitches and attach the 5 second eye 1 body round 21 decrease 4 single_crochet x8 40 use crem 130 yarn round 22 decrease 3 single_crochet x8 32 round 1 start 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 23 decrease 2 single_crochet x8 24 round 2 increase x6 12 stuff the head firmly fig 2 3 round 3
